alert.note: Alert for Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 01 at 7:40PM CDT until September 01 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL WASHITA COUNTY... At 739 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dill City, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...A weather station in Burns Flat recorded a 58 mph wind gust with this storm at 732 PM. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cordell, Burns Flat, Sentinel, Dill City, Bessie and Rocky. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
